code: import React from'react';import'./ButtonSegment.css';import{getFirstComic,getLastComic,getNextComic,getPreviousComic,getRandomComic}from"../Data/asyncActions";import{connect,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ButtonSegment=function ButtonSegment(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleFirstClick=function handleFirstClick(){dispatch(getFirstComic("FIRST"));};var handlePreviousClick=function handlePreviousClick(){dispatch(getPreviousComic("PREVIOUS"));};var handleNextClick=function handleNextClick(){dispatch(getNextComic("NEXT"));};var handleRandomClick=function handleRandomClick(){dispatch(getRandomComic("RANDOM"));};var handleLastClick=function handleLastClick(){dispatch(getLastComic("LAST"));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttonWrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleFirstClick,children:"First"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePreviousClick,children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleNextClick,children:"Next"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRandomClick,children:"Random"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLastClick,children:"Last"})]});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{num:state.num,url:state.url,month:state.month,year:state.year,news:state.news,safe_title:state.safe_title,transcript:state.transcript,alt:state.alt,img:state.img,title:state.title,day:state.day};};export var a=connect(mapStateToProps)(ButtonSegment);
